name: raml1-to-postman
description: Converts raml 1.0 files to postman v2 collection

sample_input.data:
#%RAML 1.0
title: Simple raml API
mediaType: application/json 
description: This is a simple raml API. 
version: v3 
baseUri: https://api.BasicRamlAPI.com/{version} 
securitySchemes: 
  basic: 
    type: Basic Authentication 
    description: This is basic security scheme 
  digest: 
    type: Digest Authentication 
    description: This is a digest security scheme 
  oauth_1_0: 
    description: | 
      OAuth 1.0 continues to be supported for all API requests, but OAuth 2.0 is now preferred. 
    type: OAuth 1.0 
    settings: 
      requestTokenUri: https://api.mysampleapi.com/1/oauth/request_token 
      authorizationUri: https://api.mysampleapi.com/1/oauth/authorize 
      tokenCredentialsUri: https://api.mysampleapi.com/1/oauth/access_token 
      signatures: [ 'HMAC-SHA1', 'PLAINTEXT' ] 
securedBy: oauth_1_0 
/search: 
  get: 
    responses: 
        201: 
          body: 
            application/json: 
              properties: 
                groupName: 
                  default: groupName example 
                deptCode: 
                  type: number 
                  default: 12345 
          headers: 
            Location: 
              example: /invoices/45612 
            Header: 
              example: Bangalore 
  post: 
    securedBy: [digest] 
    body: 
      properties: 
        firstname: string 
        lastname: string 
        age: number 
      example: 
        firstname: someName 
        lastname: someLastName 
        age: 10 
    headers: 
      myHeader: 
        example: headerExample 
      SomeOtherHeader: 
        example: OtherExample

author: Postman Labs <help@getpostman.com>
